unnormalised: Real Estate Buzz: Home Loan Bonanza!
normalised: Real Estate Buzz: Home Loan Bonanza!

unnormalised: Thinking of finally buying that dream flat in Bandra? Good news! Banks are rolling out some pretty sweet home loan schemes just in time for Diwali.
normalised: Thinking of finally buying that dream flat in Bandra? Good news! Banks are rolling out some pretty sweet home loan schemes just in time for Diwali.

unnormalised: HDFC and ICICI Bank are leading the charge, with interest rates hovering around 8.5% p.a. Some are even throwing in processing fee waivers – saving you potentially thousands of Rs.!
normalised: H D F C and I C I C I Bank are leading the charge, with interest rates hovering around eight point five percent per annum. Some are even throwing in processing fee waivers – saving you potentially thousands of rupees!

unnormalised: But the real kicker? SBI's new "Ghar Apna" scheme. They're offering pre-approved loans for properties under 1000 sq ft, streamlining the whole process. Imagine, zero paperwork hassle!
normalised: But the real kicker? S B I's new "Ghar Apna" scheme. They're offering pre-approved loans for properties under one thousand square feet, streamlining the whole process. Imagine, zero paperwork hassle!

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma, a leading property consultant in Delhi, says, "This is the perfect time for first-time buyers, especially in Tier 2 cities."
normalised: Doctor Sharma, a leading property consultant in Delhi, says, "This is the perfect time for first-time buyers, especially in Tier two cities."

unnormalised: Don't just take our word for it. Check out the fine print and compare offers. And hey, remember to negotiate! That extra 0.25% reduction can save you a fortune over 20 years. So, get those documents ready and let's find you that perfect *ghar*!
normalised: Don't just take our word for it. Check out the fine print and compare offers. And hey, remember to negotiate! That extra zero point two five percent reduction can save you a fortune over twenty years. So, get those documents ready and let's find you that perfect ghar!
